definition: to feel attached to/to long for/to love

sentences.english: To understand Wang's fiction, readers need to understand the relationship between sadism and masochism .
sentences.chinese: 想要理解王小波的小說，必須首先理解虐戀情結。

definition: change of affection, shift of love (idiom); to change one's feelings to another love/to fall in love with sb else
lit. to stand with each foot in a different boat (idiom)/fig. to have it both ways/to run after two hares/(especially) to have two lovers at the same time
to watch with amusement as sb makes a fool of himself
lit. lotus roots may break, but the fiber remains joined (idiom); lovers part, but still long for one another
the appearance of unity, but divided at heart (idiom); seeming harmony belies underlying disagreement
an outsider can see things more clearly or objectively than those involved (idiom)
lit. wading in mud and water/a slovenly job/sloppy
to have a falling out/to have a big argument
to tell the truth/to tell it as it is
